title: Uptown Zero Waste Day
description: Setup up a day with the goal of creating zero waste for all business and patrons of the Uptown complex activities for that day.  All waste streams are diverted to recycling and re-use, as well as trying out new behaviors for eliminating sources of need of waste.
proposal_benefits: Education for the entire community on how to convert to a zero waste process, adoption of new behaviors
proposal_role: Network Potential Consulting is a local business focused on assisting customer's with creating zero impact solutions.
requirements: Volunteers for an organization and coordination committee will be needed.

title: Park Amenity Fund
description: Looking for the best and highest rate ideas to provide funds and expertise to make happen.
proposal_benefits: Improved park amenities and community input on what those would be.
proposal_role: Our organization is offering $10,000 to fund park amenities in the community
requirements: Ideas need to be proposed by the community.

title: Downtown Food Garden Boxes
description: Build and setup garden boxes in the downtown core for local food production.
arts_impact: Community learning opportunity on growing food
proposal_benefits: Ability for residents to work together to grow in local garden boxes, and benefit from a local low cost food supply.
proposal_role: MyLivingCity is a Victoria Based non profit dedicated to creating a more sustainable community.
requirements: In order to complete this project, an organizing committee will be needed, along with several volunteers to participate in a build weekend, as well as carpentry tools and lumber.

title: Campus Improvement Grant
description: A $10,000 campus improvement grand has been provided and looking for proposals on what initiatives to fund that would benefit the campus population by create public amenities that would improve social and environmental sustainability.
community_impact: Improvements to the UVic public environment
proposal_benefits: Increase of social and environmental sustainability of the campus environment.
proposal_role: The UVic Council is a not for profit organization representing the interest of the UVIC population, and liaising with the UVic Administration.
requirements: Submit idea posts by clicking the link below.

title: On Campus Bike Repair Centre
description: Setup a bike repair centre on campus offering repair and tune up services

title: Community Compost and Recycling Centre
description: Create a small corner of the local school property for a community compost station for dropping off food scraps and making compost, as well as picking up compost for use in gardens. The station could be run with volunteers and students to learn about composting from a expert mentor.
community_impact: A space for community engagement and working together
arts_impact: Space for learning about compost from other community members
manufacturing_impact: Turning waste into valuable compost for gardens

title: Capstone Symposium
description: The Camosun Capstone Technology Symposium showcases student projects in partnership with industry sponsors.

title: test idea submission, Saanich as Student
description: test idea submission, Saanich as Student

title: Complimentary Umbrella Stations
description: Having complimentary umbrella stations at building entrances that can be used by students and staff for rainy days to move from building the building.
community_impact: Improved experience in human powered transportation

title: Community Gardens on Campus
description: Having a community garden space setup so that students and staff can grow food and garden on campus.
community_impact: Have a space for community to gather and garden, grow food and harvest communally.
nature_impact: Increasing availability of food supply for local people

title: Test Idea
description: This is an idea to test stuff

title: Plant Trees on Uptown Boulevard
description: Plant trees along the median line of Uptown Boulevard to provide more shade in the summer, as well as more access to nature.  By planting on the median line of the boulevard, it can still be used for car traffic if needed.
community_impact: Improve community spaces, and reduce urban island heating effect in summer
nature_impact: Increase access to natural spaces along public road and increase biodiversity

title: Trash Pickup Day
description: We should have a monthly community beach cleanup day to clean up all our coastal park areas.
community_impact: Creating a social event around making our community better

title: Yoga on the boulevard event at Uptown
description: An afternoon of open air yoga on the Uptown Boulevard, have 3 or 4 separate directed session of yoga for the community.
community_impact: An inclusive and community Centred event
arts_impact: Create an opportunity for learning and furthering the practice of yoga in the community

title: Campus Bike Share Service
